text: Gaseh Hadharat keu hamba Allah Neubri keu hamba Neuh nyang meuiman Dum keusenangan hanaban peugah Sabab buet nyang got dilee geujunjong Takheun tan di lon lonlakee upah Upah lon mantong gaseh ngon sayang Beujeut keu rakan nyang toe sileupah Barangsoe pubuet buet keubajikan Leubeh nibaknyan lom Kamoe tamah Maha Pengampon Allah TaÊ»ala Neuchuko hamba keu buet jroh leupah
